value.name: Gun used in Hyde Park-to-Evanston killing spree likely used in prior South Side shootings
value.description: Newly obtained police reports link the Glock handgun Jason Nightengale used in his Jan. 9 rampage to five other shootings on the South Side between 2009 and 2016.

value.name: Gun used in deadly January shooting spree between Chicago, Evanston has long history: report
value.description: A gun that a man used to kill five people in a January shooting spree between Chicago and Evanston was used in as many as five other shootings since 2009.

value.description: A gun that a man used to kill five people in January shootings in Chicago and a nearby suburb was used in as many five other shootings since 2009.
